about.description: O le app {{applicationName}} o loo maua i le {{healthAuthorityName}}.

aloha_safe.about: Ua maua le app o le AlohaSafe Alert i le
aloha_safe.contact_provider:
Faafesootai se auaunaga tau le
 soifua maloloina e fai ai se siaki mo le COVID-19 ma ta'u i ai se tulaga atonu na e latalata ai i se tasi o aafia.
aloha_safe.have_you_had_symptoms: Pe ua aliali mai ni āuga ia te oe?
aloha_safe.healthAuthorityName: Matagaluega a le Soifua Maloloina a le Setete o Hawaii
aloha_safe.legal:
Faiga Faavae Faaletulafono mo le
 AlohaSafe Alert i Telefoni Feavea'i:
aloha_safe.recognizing_symptoms:
O le iloaina o āuga o le COVID-19,
 ma le taimi na amata ai, e mafai ona fesoasoani e maitaulia poo anafea na sili ai ona e aafia (e masani lava ona feoloolo  ni aso a o lei amata ona aliali mai āuga). O le tagata ua aafia I le COVID-19 atonu e leai ni āuga, ae e mafai lava ona pipisi atu i isi.
aloha_safe.symptoms_include:
O āuga e mafai ona aofia ai se tasi
 poo nisi o mea nei:

callback.fill_out_the_info:
Faatumu faamatalaga o loo i lalo
 ona faafesootai atu lea o se contact tracer mai le {{healthAuthorityName}}.
callback.request_a_call:
Faatalosaga le vili mai o se
 contact tracer
callback.success_body:
O loo galulue mamafa a matou
contact tracer ina ia tausia pea le saogalemu o oe ma lou afio'aga. Ua maua e le {{healthAuthorityName}} lau talosaga mo se toe vili atu. O le a faafesootai mai oe e se tagata ua iai tomai faapitoa i totonu o le 24 itula.
callback.success_header: O lea ua e iai i le faasologa

common.maybe_later: Atonu i se taimi mulimuli ane
common.something_went_wrong: E iai se mea na faaletonu

Faatoese atu, e lē o maua
faamaumauga o le COVID.

Numera o siaki ua faamaonia le
aafia

E tatau ona 10 digits o le numera 
o le telefoni

escrow_verification.person_and_health_expert: Se tagata o loo talanoa atu i se tagata tomai faapitoa i le soifua maloloina

start.body:
Afai ua faamaonia i lau siaki na fai ua e aafia i le COVID-19 (e lei maua mai se siaki na sue ai le toto), e mafai ona e lipoti atu lau siaki e aunoa ma le faailoa o lou suafa.

O le lipotia o lau siaki o le a fesoasoani i isi i lou afio'aga ina ia taofiofia le pipisi o le siama.
start.header:
Lipoti atu se siaki ua faamaonia ai
 le aafia i le siama.
start.what_is_a_verification_code:
O le ā le verificaion code
 (verification code)?

user_details_form.subheader: Faailoa mai le numera o lau telefoni ma le aso na fai ai lau siaki ona matou text atu lea ia te oe lau faailoga faamaonia.

export.complete_body_bluetooth: O loo e fesoasoani e taofiofi le pipisi atu o le siama ma puipuia ai isi i lou afioaga.
export.complete_title:
Faafetai mo le tausia o le
 saogalemu o lou afio'aga!
export.consent_body_0: E tuu atu i lau faitalia pe e te manao e faailoa atu ua e aafia i le siama, ma se'iloga ua e malie i ai.
export.consent_body_2: Pau lava faamatalaga e faasoa atu o ni numera o lau telefoni o loo fefaasoaai i luga o le Bluetooth ma isi telefoni sa latalata ane i le 14 aso ua tuanai, faatasi ai ma se lamatiaga mamafa sa faavae i le taimi na alia'e ai āuga o lou aafia.
export.consent_warning_message: O le faaauau pea o le a pe ai lau verification code. Afai e te manao e faailoa atu i le lumanai le faamaonia o lou aafia i le siama, e tatau ona maua muamua sou verification code.
export.enable_exposure_notifications_body: E tatau ona e faaola le vaega e faailoa mai pe afai sa latalata i se tasi o iai le siama, e lipotia ai le iuga o se siaki ua faamaonia ua aafia i le siama
export.enable_exposure_notifications_title: Faaola le Exposure Notifications (le vaega e faailoa mai ai pe afai sa latalata I se tasi o iai le siama
export.enter_verification_code: Ta i totonu le verification code

error.invalid_format: O code atonu e na o fuainumera ma mataitusi e aofia ai.
error.network_connection_error: E lē o ola le initaneti

intro.body1: Afai ua e maua se verification code mai {{healthAuthorityName}} mo se siaki o le COVID-19 ua faamaonia le aafia i le siama, e mafai ona e tuuina mai le verification code i le faamalama o loo sosoo mai.
intro.body2: Afai e lē o iai sau code, ae ua faamaonia i lau siaki ua e aafia I le siama, e tatau ona e saili mai sau  verification code mai le {{healthAuthorityName}} a o e lei faaauau.
intro.header: O ia te oe lau verification code?
intro.what_is_a: O le ā le verification code (verification code)?

export.person_and_health_expert: Se tagata o loo talanoa atu i se tagata tomai faapitoa i le soifua maloloina
export.publish_consent_title_bluetooth: Faailoa atu i isi tagata i lou afioaga

errors.description: E lē mafai ona faamae'aina le polokalame. {{message}}
errors.internal_server_error: O loo iai ni faafitauli i le server, faamolemole toe taumafai mai i se taimi mulimuli ane
errors.timeout: Ua umi tele ona faatali le faamae'aina o le talosaga
errors.unknown: E lei mafai ona tuuina mai faamaumauga faaaliali

no_op.empty_exposure_keys: E foliga ai e leai ni encounter logs i lau masini, se'i faatali mo se 24 itula ona e amata lea pe afai faato'ā toe seti au faamaumauga. Atonu e ono moomia ona e toe talosaga mo se  verification code fou.
no_op.empty_exposure_keys_title: E lē o maua se faamaumauga o nisi na feiloai (logging data)
no_op.no_token_for_existing_keys: O faamaumauga o loo iai na tuuina atu i le server. E masani lava e ta'u mai ai sa taumafai muamua le faiga o lenei mea i le masini lenei, ae sa ese le polokalame na faaaogā. E mafai ona e faamatala atu lenei mea i e pulega na latou saunia maia le  verification code lea sa faaaogā. E {{newKeysInserted}} ki fou sa faaopoopo ai.
no_op.no_token_for_existing_keys_title: Taumafaiga e tuuina atu ki o loo iai nei

symptom_onset.did_you_have_symptoms: Pe na e faalogoina ni āuga?
symptom_onset.no_i_didnt_have: Leai, e leai ni āuga na ou lagonaina
symptom_onset.when_did_your_symptoms: O anafea na amata ai ou āuga?

verification_code_info.how_do_i_get_body: Faafesootai le pulega a le tou soifua maloloina, {{healthAuthorityName}}.
verification_code_info.how_do_i_get_header: E faapefea ona ou maua se  verification code?
verification_code_info.info_body:
O le  verification code, o se code lea e tuu atu ia te oe e le pulega a le tou soifua maloloina, {{healthAuthorityName}}, pe afai ua e tuuina atu le iuga o lau siaki na fai, ua e aafia i le siama o le faama'i.

O le  verification code e faaaogā e faamautinoa ai, e moni lava le iuga o lou siaki na fai, ua e aafia i le siama.

O  verification code taitasi o le a uma le aogā pe a mavae se taimi puupuu ina ia faamautinoa ai e lē tuuina atu iuga o siaki ua leva ona te'a.

Afai e iai se mea sese i luga o lau masini i le taimi o loo e taumafai e tuuina atu lau  verification code, e tatau ona e toe tapa i le pulega a le tou soifua maloloina mo se isi code fou a o lei toe tuuina atu.
verification_code_info.info_header: O le ā le verification code?
verification_code_info.what_happens_body:
A o e tuuina mai lau verification code, o le a tāpā oe e le app e faailoa mai ni exposure keys e lē o faaalialia solo, mai isi masini ia o loo e fesootai atu i ai.

Afai e tuu atu lau faatagana, o le a lafo atu e le app nei ki i se server o loo faailoa maia ni tulaga ua latalata ai i se tasi o iai le siama. O le a faailoa atu e le server mo faaaliga i masini o loo e fesoota'i ai  le iuga o le siaki lea ua faamaonia ai ua e aafia.

E lē taitai ona aoaoina ma teu e le app ni faamatalaga e patino i se tagata. E na o ki e lē faailoaina faalauaitele o loo teu i luga o lau masini e mafai ona faasoa atu.
verification_code_info.what_happens_header: O le ā se mea e tupu pe a ou tuuina atu la'u code?

exposure_history.check_for_exposures: Siaki mo ni tulaga ua latalata ai i ē o iai le siama
exposure_history.days_remaining: E {{daysOfQuarantineLeft}} aso o loo totoe I le vaitaimi na fautuaina ai le faanofoesea o oe mo le vaavaaiga lelei.

exposure_detail.next_steps: Toe iloilo taiala mo le soifua maloloina
exposure_detail.schedule_callback: Faatulaga se vili o le telefoni e saili se fesoasoani mai se contact tracer (polokalame e faailoa ai tagata sa latalata i ē ua iai le siama) mai le {{healthAuthorityName}}.

exposure_history.exposure_report: Lipoti tulaga sa latalata ai i se tasi ua aafia i le siama
exposure_history.exposure_summary: O se tasi sa e latalata i ai i le va o le {{startDate}} ma le {{endDate}} ua faamaonia i lana siaki ua aafia i le COVID-19.

health_guidelines.six_feet_apart: Tausisi le 6 futu le va ma le isi tagata
health_guidelines.stay_home: Nofo i le fale pe a ma'i
health_guidelines.title: Taiala o le Soifua Maloloina
health_guidelines.two_meters_apart: Tausisi le 2 mita le va ma le isi tagata
health_guidelines.wash_your_hands: Ia fufulu ou lima i taimi uma

exposure_history.how_does_this_work_para: Pe a ola le Exposure Notifications, e faaaogā e lau telefoni le Bluetooth e fesuia'i ma sefe ai faasologa o numera (e ta'u o random IDs) mai soo se telefoni o loo latalata i lena telefoni o loo ola foi le Exposure Notifications. O IDs o le a lē maitaulia patino ai oe i isi tagata ma e fesuisuia'i i le tele o taimi o le aso ina ia puipuia ai lava lou tulaga totino.
exposure_history.more_info: A'oa'oina atili e uiga i le vaega e faailoa mai ai pe na latalata i se tasi o iai le siama (Exposure Notifications)
exposure_history.no_connectivity_message: E lē o ola lau initaneti!
exposure_history.no_exposure_reports: Leai ni Lipoti o le Latalata ise tasi ua iai le siama
exposure_history.no_exposure_reports_over_past: Ua te'a le 14 aso e te lei maua se lipoti o se latalata I se tasi ua iai le siama
exposure_history.possible_exposures: Nisi Atonu na Latalata i se tasi ua iai le siama
exposure_history.review_health_guidance: Toe Iloilo Taiala a le Soifua Maloloina
exposure_history.why_did_i_get_an_en: Aisea na ou maua ai se faailoaga pe afai e iai sa latalata i se isi ua aafia i le siama
exposure_history.why_did_i_get_an_en_para: O le a e maua se faailoaga pe afai sa e latalata I se tasi ua maua mulimuli ane i sona siaki na fai mo le COVID-19 ua aafia i le siama ma ua manao e faailoa atu i isi.
exposure_history.your_device_exchanged:
I totonu o aso taitasi ua faasolo atu i lalo, sa fefaasoaa'i e lau masini ki ma le isi masini
lea na maua mulimuli ane ai le iuga o le siaki ua aafia le tagata i le siama.

exposure_notification_alerts.bluetooth_body: Ina ia faaola le Exposure Notifications, e tatau ona e faaola muamua le Bluetooth i lau Settings app.
exposure_notification_alerts.cant_check_for_exposures_body: E tatau ona faaola le Exposure Notifications e siaki ai poo iai nisi na latalata i se tasi ua aafia i le siama
exposure_notification_alerts.cant_check_for_exposures_title: E lē mafai ona siaki mo nisi na latalata i se tasi ua aafia i le siama
exposure_notification_alerts.location_body: E tāpā  e le Google ia masini o loo faaaogāina le Android 10 poo lalo ifo ia iai ni vaega mo nofoaga e mafai ona faaaogā le Exposure Notifications. E LĒ sueina pe teuina pea  e le {{applicationName}} se faamaumauga o lou nofoaga.
exposure_notification_alerts.set_active_region_ios_body: Tatala le Settings app, saili mo le vaega o le Exposure Notifications i lenei app, ona oomi lea o le "Set As Active Region".
exposure_notification_alerts.set_active_region_ios_title: Set Active Region (faailoa le vaipanoa o loo iai lē ua aafia i le siama)
exposure_notification_alerts.share_exposure_information_ios_body: Tatala le Settings app, saili mo le vaega o le Exposure Notifications i lenei app. Faamautinoa o loo faaola le "Share Exposure Information", ona oomi lea o le 'Set As Active Region'.
exposure_notification_alerts.share_exposure_information_ios_title: Share Exposure Information (faasoa atu faamatalaga o se tasi na latalata i se tasi ua aafia I le siama)
exposure_notification_alerts.unhandled_error_body: E iai se mea na tupu sa lei faatalitalia. Faamolemole tapuni ona toe tatala lea o le app ma toe fai.
exposure_notification_alerts.unhandled_error_title: E iai se mea na faaletonu
exposure_notification_alerts.use_exposure_notifications_android_body: Ina ia faaola le Exposure Notifications, alu i le faamalama o le COVID-19 Exposure Notifications o lau Settings app ma faaola le "Use Exposure Notifications".

exposure_scanning_status.your_device_is_not: E lē o mafai e lau masini ona maua i latou o loo latalata i se tasi ua aafia i le siama. Faalelei le faalētonu o loo ta'ua i lalo ina ia faaola ai le Exposure Detection.
exposure_scanning_status.your_device_is_scanning: O loo mafai e lau masini ona maua i latou o loo latalata i se tasi ua aafia i le siama ma o le a faaauau lava ona faia faapena e tusa pe e te tapunia le app.

bluetooth.location_disabled_error_message: Ina ia faaola le Exposure Notifications, ia faataga le oo atu I le Location i le Settings app
bluetooth.location_subheader: E lē taitai ona oo le {{applicationName}}  i faamaumauga o lou nofoaga ma le taitai ona sueina atu lau masini
bluetooth.proximity_tracing_header:
Exposure Notifications (le vaega e
 faailoa mai ai pe afai sa latalata i se tasi o iai le siama)
bluetooth.share_message: Siaki le app lenei {{applicationName}}, e mafai ona fesoasoani ia i tatou e taofiofi le oo mai o le COVID-19 {{appDownloadUrl}}
bluetooth.tracing_off_header: O loo tapē le Exposure Detection
bluetooth.tracing_on_header: O loo ki le Exposure Detection

home.bluetooth_info_body: Ua iiteina e lau telefoni isi telefoni sa e faaaogā e latalata i le faaaogāina o le Bluetooth Low Energy. E mafai ai e le app ona tatala mea o loo e faia i aso taitasi e aunoa ma le iloa e isi, e tusa lava pe e te lē o tatalaina le app i lau masini.
home.call_emergency_services: Vili le Emergency Services (auaunaga mo ma'i ma faalavelave faafuase'i)

error.share_link_failed: Lei mafai ona tatala le link e faasoa

home.have_a_positive_test: Pe na fai lou siaki ma l faamaonia e te lē o aafia?
home.location_info_body: E tāpā  e le Google ia masini o loo faaaogāina le Android 10 poo lalo ifo ia iai ni vaega mo nofoaga e mafai ona faaaogā le Exposure Detection. E LĒ sueina pe teuina pea  e le {{applicationName}} se faamaumauga o lou nofoaga.
home.location_info_subheader: E lē  sueina pe teuina pea  e le {{applicationName}} se faamaumauga o lou nofoaga.
home.open_healthcheck: Siaki faalauaitele o le soifua maloloina
home.proximity_tracing_info_body_1: Afai o loo ki smartphones lea ua tuu i ai le app, faaola ma le Bluetooth, ma o loo fetalata'i mo se vaitaimi, ua faamauina ai la i lau masini se fesootaiga ma se tasi ua iai le siama.
home.proximity_tracing_info_body_2: I lena fesootaiga, o au faamaumauga, ma faamatalaga e tumau lava ona lē iloaina e isi. E lē teuina i le app soo se faamaumauga totino. E na o ID eseese e fefaasoaa'i. O mea na e tapē pe a mavae le 14 aso.
home.proximity_tracing_info_subheader_1: Faapefea ona aogā le Exposure Notifications?

verification_code_card.if_you_have_a_code: Tuuina mai la'u verification code e fesoasoani i le tausia o le saogalemu o lou afio'aga.
verification_code_card.if_you_have_a_positive_test: Afai ua faamaonia i lau siaki ua e aafia i le COVID-19,  e mafai ona e lipoti mai le siaki e aunoa ma le faailoa mai o oe, e fesoasoani ina ia faatumau le saogalemu o lou afio'aga.
verification_code_card.more_info: O le ā le verification code?
verification_code_card.report_positive_test: Lipoti mai Siaki ua Faamaonia le Aafia i le Siama

onboarding.app_setup_complete_body: O loo aogā le {{applicationName}}. Faafetai mo le fesoasoani mai e faamuta le pipisi o le faama'i.
onboarding.app_setup_incomplete_body: E tāpā e le {{applicationName}} le faatagana a le Exposure Notifications ma le Bluetooth ina ia iloa ai poo anafea na e latalata atu i se tasi ua aafia I le COVID-19. E mafai ona e pulea lenei mea i le Settings.
onboarding.app_setup_incomplete_header: E lē o Mae'a le App Setup
onboarding.app_setup_incomplete_location_body: E tāpā e le {{applicationName}} le faatagana a le Exposure Notifications, Bluetooth, ma le Location ina ia iloa ai poo anafea na e latalata atu i se tasi ua aafia I le COVID-19. E mafai ona e pulea lenei mea i le Settings.
onboarding.eula_agree_terms_of_use: Ou te ioe ua uma ona ou faitauina ma talia aiaiga o le faaaogāina
onboarding.i_am_over: Ioe, ua silia ma le {{minimumAge}} lo'u matua
onboarding.location_alert_body: Ina ia faaaogā le Exposure Notifications, e tatau ona faaola le Location Services
onboarding.location_body: E tāpā  e le Google ia masini o loo faaaogāina le Android 10 poo lalo ifo ia iai ni vaega mo nofoaga e mafai ona faaaogā le Exposure Detection. E LĒ sueina pe teuina pea  e le {{applicationName}} se faamaumauga o lou nofoaga.
onboarding.location_services_already_active: O loo ola auaunaga mo le Location
onboarding.location_subheader: E lē taitai ona oo le {{applicationName}}  i faamaumauga o lou nofoaga ma le taitai ona sueina atu lau masini.
onboarding.no_take_me: Leai, toe faafoi a'u i tua
onboarding.notification_body1: O le a e mauaina ni faaaliga pe a fai ua umi tele o e latalata i se tasi ua lipotia mai le aafia i le COVID-19.
onboarding.notification_body2: E fai e le app lenei mea e faaaogā ai le Bluetooth Low Energy ma maua ai ni codes eseese e aunoa ma le iloa poo ai oe poo fea foi sa e iai. E mafai ona e tapē lenei app I soo se taimi i settings.
onboarding.notification_header: Ia faailoa atu pe afai sa e latalata i se tasi ua aafia i le siama
onboarding.notification_subheader1: O afea o le a faailoa mai ai ia te au?
onboarding.notification_subheader3: E lē puipuia e lenei app oe mai le pisia i le COVID-19.

protect_privacy.body_1: E lē o iai i nei IDs ni faamatalaga totino ma e ta'i 10-20 minute ma toe suia ina ia puipuia ai lou faasinomaga.
protect_privacy.body_2: E faafesuia'I e telefoni IDs eseese ma isi masini e faaaogā ai le Bluetooth Low Energy. E mafai ai ona sue ai e le {{applicationName}}  i latou e te fetaui i ai i aso taitasi e aunoa ma le faailoaina, e tusa lava pe lē o tatalaina i lau masini.
protect_privacy.body_3: Pe a uma ona faamaonia i lau siaki ua e aafia i le COVID-19, e mafai e I latou o loo faaaogāina le app ona faailoa se verification code i le {{applicationName}} ina ia faamaonia ai o latou aafiaga. O le a faailoga IDs talu ai nei o a latou telefoni ma tuu ma le saogalemu i luga o le server. O lenei faiga tau faamaoniga e mafai ona taofia ai ni lipotia sese o nisi faapea ua aafia i le siama.
protect_privacy.body_4: Afai e tutusapau le ID ua faailoga ma se ID o loo teu i lau telefoni,  e faaalia ai atonu sa e fetaui i se tasi ua faamaonia lona siaki ua aafia i le COVID-19. O le auala lena e mafai ai e le {{applicationName}} ona iloa pe faamata ua e aliali atu i le siama.
protect_privacy.body_5:
Afai ua maua e tutusa, o le a faailoa atu e le {{applicationName}} ia te oe ma avatu nisi taiala atili mai le tou matagaluega o le soifua maloloina.

O le auala lenei e mafai e le {{applicationName}} ona avatua ia te oe le malosi e fai ai au faaiuga e faatatau i lou soifua maloloina, ma tausi ai pea le saogalemu o lou afio'aga, ae fai nei mea uma e aunoa ma le iloa poo ai oe ae o fea foi sa e iai.
protect_privacy.subheader_1: Pe a e faaola le Exposure Notifications, ua aofia ai ma lau telefoni i IDs eseese ia e fai ma fesuisuia'i.
protect_privacy.subheader_2: O telefoni o loo iai Exposure Notifications e mafai ona fesuia'ia IDs ma isi masini e aliali atu i ai
protect_privacy.subheader_3: Pe a faamaonia le siaki ua aafia i le siama se tagata o loo faaaogāina se masini, e mafai ona latou filifili pe faailoa le tulaga ua iai lo latou soifua maloloina e aunoa ma le iloa poo ai latou
protect_privacy.subheader_4: E tau fai faamanatu mai lea taimi i lea taimi e telefoni taitasi i le server mo le lisi o IDs ua faailoga ma saili mo isi IDs ua tutusapau
protect_privacy.subheader_5: O le a faailoa atu ia te oe pe afai e maua e le {{applicationName}} se ID ua aafia i le siama e tutusapau ma le ID ua faailoga

onboarding.protect_privacy_button: Le auala e puipuia ai mataupu e patino ia te oe
onboarding.proximity_tracing_body1: Afai o loo ki smartphones ua iai le app, o loo faaola le Bluetooth, ma ua umi se taimi o felata'I nei telefoni, e iai se tasi na e feiloai i ai ua faamauina pe lesitalaina i luga o lau masini.
onboarding.proximity_tracing_body2: I lena fesootaiga, o au faamaumauga, ma faamatalaga e tumau lava ona lē iloaina e isi. E lē teuina i le app soo se faamaumauga totino. E na o ID eseese e fefaasoaa'i. O mea na e tapē pe a mavae le 14 aso.
onboarding.proximity_tracing_subheader3: E lē puipuia e lenei app oe mai le pisia i le COVID-19.
onboarding.screen1_header: E mafai ona tatou galulue faatasi e taofiofi le pipisi vave o le COVID-19.
onboarding.screen1_image_label: E toalua tagata o loo faapā faatasi o la lima
onboarding.screen1_title: Malo lava mo le faaaogāina o le AlohaSafe Alert
onboarding.screen2_button: Poo puipuia mea e patino ia te au?
onboarding.screen2_header: E manatua e lau telefoni isi masini e fesootai i ai, ae lē faailoaina ai oe i isi.
onboarding.screen2_image_label: E toalua tagata o loo talanoa ia la telefoni
onboarding.screen3_button: E faapefea pe afai sa ou latalata atu i se tasi ua aafia i le siama?
onboarding.screen3_header: E lē taitai ona alu ese atu ma lau telefoni faamatalaga e maitaulia ai oe.
onboarding.screen3_image_label: Se tagata o loo i luma o se telefoni o loo loka
onboarding.screen4_header: O le a faailoa atu e le app ia te oe pe afai ua e latalata i se tagata ua aafia i le COVID-19
onboarding.screen4_image_label: O se tagata o loo ia maua mai ni faaaliga i lana telefoni
onboarding.welcome_image_label: Se ata faata'ita'i o tagata o loo fai uma a latou ufifofoga, o loo fesootai e solo e pei o ni faapona (nodes) o loo fesootai solo.
onboarding.you_must_be: E tatau ona {{minimumAge}} lou matua pe sili atu e faaaogā ai le {{applicationName}}. Po ua silia ma le {{minimumAge}} ou tausaga?

product_analytics.share_anonymized_data:
Faasoa atu Data e Lē Faailoaina ai
se Tasi
product_analytics.share_anonymized_data_disclaimer:
O le faia, ua e malie ai e faasoa atu
 data o mea na tutpu e aunoa ma le faailoaina o se tasi I le {{healthAuthorityName}}
product_analytics.share_data_para_1: O data ua aoaoina faatasi ma e lē faailoaina i isi, e uiga i le auala o loo faaaogā ai e tagata lautele lenei app, ua fesoasoani i le {{healthAuthorityName}} Komisi, e vailiili, malamalama, ma taofiofia ai le pipisi atu o le COVID-19.
product_analytics.share_data_para_2: E lē o iai i lenei data ni faamatalaga e maitaulia totino ai se tasi.
product_analytics.stop_sharing_data: Taofi le Faasoa atu o Data

screen_titles.exposure_notifications:
Exposure Notifications (le vaega e
faailoa mai ai pe afai sa latalata i se tasi o iai le siama)
screen_titles.exposure_scanning: Exposure Detection (iiteina ua latalata i se tasi o iai le siama)
screen_titles.protect_privacy:
Faapefea ona matou puipuia mea
e totino ia te oe

age_range.how_old_are_you: Ua fia tausaga o lou matua?

call_emergency_services.urgent_medical_attention_needed:
Atonu e moomia se fesoasoani
 faanatinati ai se foma'i. Vili loa le {{emergencyPhoneNumber}} pe alu i le Emergency Department

emergency_symptoms.are_you_experiencing:
O e lagonaina nisi o nei āuga
faafuase'i?
emergency_symptoms.chest_pain:
Ogaoga, faalausosoo le tiga o le
 fatafata
emergency_symptoms.disorientation:
Matuā lē sagatonu le mafaufau pe
 ua lē tali lelei mai
emergency_symptoms.lightheadedness: Ogaoga, faalausosoo le tau tigatigā o le ulu
emergency_symptoms.select_any: Filifili āuga uma o loo e maua ai (pe leai se āuga)

general_symptoms.are_you_experiencing: Poo e lagonaina nisi o nei āuga?
general_symptoms.cough: Amata ona tale pe ua faateteleina le leaga o le tale
general_symptoms.difficulty_breathing: Tau amata ona faafaigata le mānava
general_symptoms.loss_of_smell_taste_appetite: Ua faaauau lava ona lē toe lagonaina manogi o mea, tofo o mea'ai, pe ua leai se mata'ai
general_symptoms.select_any: Filifili āuga uma o loo e maua ai

guidance.call_your_healthcare_provider: Vili le tou vaega a le soifua maloloina, le laina telefoni mo fautuaga faafoma'I, poo le vaega e te vili ai le telefoni mo talavai i totonu o le 24 itulau.
guidance.clean_hands: Ia fufulu ou lima i taimi uma.
guidance.cover_coughs: Ia pupuni lou fofoga pe a e tale ma mafatua.
guidance.dont_go_to_work: Aua e te alu e faigaluega, i le aoga, poo nofoaga faitele.
guidance.dont_use_public_transport: Aua e te fealua'i i auala o feoa'iga lautele pe e te lua o faatasi ma se isi tagata I se taavale.
guidance.drink_water: To'aga e inu le vai ma isi mea faasuavaia manino e taofi ai le alu ese o le vai mai lou tino (dehydration).
guidance.feeling_fine: Fiafia e faalogo atu ua e malosi. E tatau lava ona vaavaai lelei ou āuga ma nofo lelei i le fale.
guidance.find_telehealth: Saili mo auaunaga tau soifua maloloina e faatino i luga o le telefoni
guidance.follow_cdc_guidance: Afai ua alia'e ni ou āuga, mulimuli I le taiala CDC.
guidance.if_symptoms_develop: Afai sa alia'e ia te oe soo se āuga o le COVID-19 pe ua amata faateteleina le lelei o lau faalogo, vili le tou vaega a le soifua maloloina, le laina telefoni mo fautuaga faafoma'I, poo le vaega e te vili ai le telefoni mo talavai.
guidance.may_help_you_feel_better: O nsi nei o laasaga e ono fesoasoani e te lagona ai le malosi:
guidance.monitor_your_symptoms: E alofa atu ua e ma'i. Nofo i le fale ma mata'itu lelei ou āuga. Vili i le tou falema'I pe a e lagona ua tigaina tele ou āuga, nofo i le fale.
guidance.practice_social_distancing: Faatino le tausi o le vāvāmamao.
guidance.protect_others: Fai laasaga nei ina ia fesoasoani e puipuia isi mai le oo ina mama'i.
guidance.rest: Nofo i le fale ma malolo.
guidance.seek_medical_care: Afai e te lagona o se mea ua moomia vave se fesoasoani pe ua e lagona le tigaina, saili loa se fesoasoani faafoma'i.
guidance.stay_6_feet_away: Ia tausisia pea le lē itiiti ifo ma le 6 futu le mamao mai isi ma aua e te alu i le mea o loo tumutumu ai tagata.
guidance.stay_at_home: Nofo i le fale se'ivaganā pe a alu e vaai se foma'i.
guidance.stay_away_from_higher_risk_people: Afai e mafai, aua ne'i e latalata i tagata e lamatiagofie i le ono mama'I mai le COVID-19.
guidance.stay_home_14_days: Nofo i le fale mo le 14 aso.
guidance.take_care_of_yourself: Faata'ita'i ona e tausia oe lava pe tausi se isi o loo ma'i.
guidance.take_temperature: Fua faalua lou fiva i le aso ma mata'itu ni āuga o le COVID-19 e alia'e.
guidance.watch_for_covid_symptoms: Mata'itu ni āuga o le COVID-19.
guidance.you_have_underlying_conditions: E alofa atu ua e ma'i. Atonu e fesootai atu ou āuga i le COVID-19. E iai foi isi ou ma'I atonu e te oo ai i se lamatiaga o lou matuā ma'i tigaina.
guidance.your_symptoms_might_be_related: E alofa atu ua e ma'i. Atonu e fesootai atu ou āuga i le COVID-19.

intro.agree_and_start_assessment: Ioeina ma amata loa le iloiloga
intro.covid19_self_assessment: Iloiloga a le Tagata Lava ia  mo le COVID-19
intro.find_out_how_to_care: Saili pe faapefea ona e tausia oe lava ma tausi ma isi pe afai sa iai se fesootaiga vavalalata ma se tasi ua faamaonia le aafia i le COVID-19
intro.if_this_is: Afai o se ma'i tigaina, vili loa le {{emergencyPhoneNumber}}
intro.learn_more: Faamasani atili i le CDC Coronavirus Self-Checker lea e faavae mai ai luga lenei Self Assessment (iloiloga a le tagata ia te ia lava)
intro.this_is_based_on: O loo faavae a'e i luga o le taiala sili ona lata mai  sa maua mai le CDC ma atonu sa toe faafou a o mavae atu taimi, a o tatou a'oa'oina isi mea e tele i le auala e pipisi ai le siaa ma faapogaia ai le faama'i
intro.this_is_not_intended: E lē o fuafuaina lenei mea mo se faamautinoaina o le ma'i poo se togafitiga
intro.you_are_a_resident: O oe o se tagatā o loo nofo i le afio'aga ua lagolagoina e {{ healthAuthorityName }}

underlying_conditions.blood_disorder: O faalētonu o le toto, e pei o le faama'i o le lē lava o sela mūmū o le toto (sickle cell disease) poo le lē lava o sela faatupu toto (thalassemia)
underlying_conditions.cerebrovascular_disease: Faama'i o le pepē o ālatoto o le fai'ai poo tulaga o neura o le tino, e pei o le pē o le fai'ai (stroke) poo le galogalo mea (dementia)
underlying_conditions.do_you_have: O maua oe I se tasi o nei mea?
underlying_conditions.heart_condition: O tulaga ogaoga o le fatu, e pei āuga eseese ua afaina ai le fatu (heart failure, coronary artery disease, poo le cardiomyopathy)
underlying_conditions.select_all_or_none: Filifili uma vaega o loo e maua ai (pe leai)
underlying_conditions.weakened_immune_system: Ua vaivai le vaega o le tino e tetee atu I faama'i poo le faaaogāina o ni talavai e ono faaleagaina ai le vaega o le tino e tetee atu i faama'i (immune system)

settings.delete_data_disclosure1: Pe a e oomia le "Delete My Data", o le a tapē uma ai lava faamaumauga sa teu i le {{applicationName}}:
settings.delete_data_disclosure2: E lē tapēina ai faamaumauga na fau a'e pe aoaoina mai e lau masini mo Exposure Notifications.
settings.delete_data_language_token: E mafai ona e tapēina nei faamaumauga faaopoopo i le Settings a lau masini.
settings.delete_data_onboarding_token: O se vaega (token) o loo teu i lau masini e sefe ai pe faamata ua e faamae'aina le vaega amata o le app
settings.delete_data_product_analytics: O le vaega (token) o loo teu i lau masini e sefe ai pe faamata ua e malie i le faasoaina atu o faamaumauga (product analytics data)
settings.delete_data_symptom_history: Soo se faamaumauga o āuga (symptom logs) o loo teuina I lau masini
settings.delete_data_this_action: O le a tapē ese e lenei faiga faamaumauga uma lava sa teu i le {{applicationName}}.

errors.deleting_data: Faamalie atu, e lē mafai ona matou tapēina ou faamaumauga

settings.not_sharing_anonymized_data: E lē faasoaina atu faamaumauga e lē o faailoaina  ai se tasi
settings.share_anonymized_data: Faasoa atu faamaumauga e lē o faailoaina ai se tasi
settings.sharing_anonymized_data:
Faasoaina atu faamaumauga e lē o
faailoaina ai se tasi

symptom.congestion_or_runny_nose: Afu le tino pe tafe le isu
symptom.inability_to_wake_or_stay_awake: Leai se malosi e nofo i luga pe ala umi
symptom.new_confusion: E fou le nunumi o le mafaufau
symptom.new_loss_of_taste_or_smell:
E fou le lē manogi se tofo poo se 
manogi
symptom.persistent_pain_or_pressure_in_the_chest: Faaauau ona tiga pe fufusi le fatafata
symptom.shortness_of_breath_or_difficulty_breath: Tau lē lava le mānava pe ua faigata ona mānava

symptom_history.did_not_feel_well: Sa lei malosi lau faalogo pei ua e ma'i

errors.updating_symptoms: E faamalie atu, e lē mafai ona matou toe faafouina suiga o āuga e lagonaina

symptom_history.no_entry: Leai se mea o tuuina i totonu
symptom_history.share_history: Faasoa atu talaaga o āuga na iai

sharing.header: Talaaga o āuga mai le {{startDate}} e oo i le {{endDate}}
sharing.no_symptoms_were_logged: E leai ni āuga na tuuina i totonu
sharing.you_did_not_feel_well: Sa lei malosi lau faalogo pei ua e ma'I, e aofia ai ma āuga: {{symptomList}}

symptom_history.to_protect_your_privacy: Ina ia puipuia ou tulaga totino, o mea uma e tuu I totonu o loo teu uma i lau masini ma e otomeki lava ona tapē pe a mavae le {{days}} aso.

verification_code_alerts.code_used_body: Ua uma ona faaaogā le verificaion code.
verification_code_alerts.code_used_title: Uma ona Faaaogā le Verification Code
verification_code_alerts.invalid_code_body:
E lē o sa'o le verificaion code na e tuuina mai.

E tatau ona sa'o le verificaion code e tuu atu ia te oe e le pulega a le tou soifua maloloina.

E mafai foi ona uma le aogā o lau verificaion code. Afai e sa'o, e tatau la ona e toe talosaga i le pulega a le tou soifua maloloina mo se code fou.
verification_code_alerts.invalid_code_title: E lē o sa'o le Code
verification_code_alerts.network_connection_body: E moomia ona ola lau WiFi e lafo mai ai le verificaion code.
verification_code_alerts.network_connection_title: E lē o Ola le Initaneti
verification_code_alerts.unknown_body: E iai se mea sese na tupu sa lei faatalitalia. Toe taumafai.
verification_code_alerts.unknown_title: E Iai se Mea na Faalētonu
